page.title: 13Lockinge Estate,Ardington(1)
page.content: Locking Estate was built up in the late 19th.Century by Lord and Lady Wantage after Lady Wantage's father had settled money and some land in Lockinge on them when they married. Over the years from 1859 to about 1890 the family made many purchases of land until the estate was complete.They spent a great deal of time and money in improving the villages of Ardington and Lockinge.Some old and decrepit housing was removed and model cottages built in 1860 and other buildings were improved. The estate is still in the hands of the same family,but it has changed its nature.In 1900 there were 850 people living in the villages and the entire working population was employed by the estate.By 1960 there were 700 people and 160 employees.Now the decline in numbers is arrested but the estate employs only 50.
